mapper.select: SELECT r.HOSP_BAR_CODE, r.PAT_NAME, r.REPORT_DOCTOR, CONVERT ( VARCHAR,p.APPLY_DATE, 120 ) AS jyrqq, r.HOSP_TEST_ID, r.REPORT_RESULT, r.TEST_STATE, r.REFERENCE, r.UNIT AS itemunit, '' AS sampleno, '' AS sex, r.VERIFIED_DOCTOR, CONVERT ( VARCHAR,p.RESULT_DATE, 120 ) AS checkdatetime, '' AS checkercode, '' AS techniciancode, '' AS wzms FROM dbo.T_TEST_RESULTS_HIS_REPORT r INNER JOIN dbo.T_TEST_PATIENTS_HIS_REPORT p ON r.PTID = p.PTID WHERE r.HOSP_BAR_CODE = #{patientcode8} ORDER BY r.TEST_DATE DESC
